description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Arcade of Neon is a collection of various game modes ranging from table tennis to fast paced color dodging and matching that will test your skills by throwing different mechanics at you with each game mode. Complete challenges to unlock more game modes and get the #1 highscore!
